desc: 50% max HP, 100% all elemental damage, probable 25% damage reduction, 20% reduction to BB activation cost & negates all status ailments and Atk, Def, Rec reduction

dictionary.lore:
A necklace of golden pearls, featuring a large iridescent pearl prominently at the wearer's throat. This deep-sea treasure is worn by the seal-shifter Aoife, Maiden of Eyinhel.

Possessing a shapeshifter's totem grants one great power over them, and most, if not all, do not relinquish these items easily. But so taken was Aoife with her Pactbound that she presented this to them as a token of promise.

Following the tragedy, the large pearl subsequently lost its original luster, taking on a deeper, darker hue. Peer at it long enough, and streaks of red appear to cross its azure surface...

name: Seabound Vow
